content:
Read Online

Read at shaknaisrael.com.

Read on Kobo.

Series

  • Drakes
  • Drakes: The Five Eyes
  • Drakes: Heroes and Villains

Blurb

Three years after Drakes: The Five Eyes, a global investigation into the events is underway, and all eyes are on Suzie Drakes.

Some want to see her as the scapegoat, others the victim.

She just wants to be left alone.

But the world isn't that nice.

Contribute

You can find the latest version of this book, over on Github.

From there, you can help make changes, grab your own copy, and make and publish your own version of the book, if you want.

That's the beauty of Open Source.
